activities: We engage in online lead generation wherein we collect voluntarily provided personal information and match consumers with those providing the products the consumer has inquired about. Our company is based in the United States and all servers will be located in the United States. Consumers will enter their data on our websites on their own and will submit this data to us for the purposes of matching them with businesses engaged in providing the products and services the consumer has requested. Only as much information as is required to perform the business purpose requested shall be collected from the consumer and it shall be transmitted and stored using SSL encryption. This information will only be retained for as long as is necessary to complete the business purpose requested by the consumer.
personaldata: We collect personally identifiable information including name, birth date, address, phone number, email address, and bank account number
privacyprograms: We are not currently a member of any privacy programs.
recoursemech: We have applied for and will hold a consumer credit license issued by the Office of Fair Trading in the UK. Any consumer who is dissatisfied with the results of our in-house complaints handling procedure may use the OFT complaints handling procedures to have their complaint addressed by a third party. Consumers will be notified of this option on our websites. We encourage interested persons to raise any concerns using the contact information provided and we will investigate and attempt to resolve any complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the Principles. If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using the European Data Protection Authorities as a third party resolution provider.
